alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 8:26PM CST until further notice by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Pickens Counties. Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Marengo Counties. Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo, Sumter and Hale Counties. .The Tombigbee River continues to rise and flood warning remain in effect. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1130 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Saturday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Flooding of lowlands in the area occurs and cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 55.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning and continue rising to a crest of 72.1 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
